# Quarto in Theoretical Ecotoxicology


$$ sumTU=log_{10} \left( \sum_{i=1}^n \frac{c_i}{EC_{50_i}} \right) \ $$

where $c_i$ is the concentration of the pesticide $i$ and $EC_{50i}$ is the concentration of pesticide $i$ at which 50 % of the test organisms (*Daphnia magna*) were affected.
